answers.author: Alexandra Iannolo
answers.text:
Hello,
A question similar to your own was previously asked on the Knowledge Network. You can view the answers it received below.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/questions/kn/Question/20763/Telecommuting_Policy
I have also included some additional sample policies.
City of Mercer Island, WA
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/14663/The_Telecommuters_Guide
City of Madison
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/6765/Madison_Administrative_Procedure_Telecommuting_Policy
This is a program overview from Austin, TX which features FAQs.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2964/Telework_Program_Overview
These articles address the issues that arise when managing with a mobile work force.
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/3818/Mobile_Workforce_Management
http://icma.org/en/icma/knowledge_network/documents/kn/Document/2128/Virtual_Work__Preparing_for_the_Changing_Labor_Force
I hope these help!
Ali Iannolo
Knowledge Network Intern
aiannolo@ICMA.org
